title: Thief
description: Just when I thought I was making progress with Ronan, Wells, Abel, and Bishop, all hell breaks loose.I don’t know who to trust.And the accusations flying around leave me wondering if I’m to blame for the chaos…Or if I’m about to expose the truth once and for all.More than my heart is at stake here.Thief is the second book in the Loxley Prep reverse harem series.
author: Hattie Jude
